instruction: Generate a newsletter about the positive effects of exercise on the heart.
output: Good news for heart health- regular exercise is one of the most effective ways to improve your cardiovascular health! A recent study has found that aerobic exercise can improve your heart and lung function, as well as reducebad cholesterol levels. It can also strengthen your heart muscle and decrease your risk of heart disease and stroke. Exercise is an easy and enjoyable way to reduce your risk of heart disease and improve your overall health. So, get your heart rate up to keep your heart healthy and strong!
